Class FMLRenderAccessLibrary

java.lang.Object
  net.minecraft.src.FMLRenderAccessLibrary

public class FMLRenderAccessLibrary
extends Object

A static hook library for optifine and other basemod editing code to access FML functions

Author:
cpw
